page.title: 01THE VILLAGE OF RUDDINGTON
page.content: {RUDDINGTON }is a village with about 7000 residents and covers about 3000 acres.It is about a quarter of an hour by car from {NOTTINGHAM}which provides the residents with city life. {RUDDINGTON}has a thriving High Street and community life.It has all the necessary amenities but these are mainly counted in grid ref.04560333. There is a {RUDDINGTON VILLAGE GUIDE } published by the Parish Council whch is full of all the details for this lively village of many pubs and clubs. {RUDDINGTON}is a friendly village with a mixture of old residents and people from the new estates. It is interesting to see how many of the present day activities have a connection with the past and it is difficult to forget the history of { {RUDDINGTON. }
